Class PatientAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<PatientAdapter.PatientAdapterHolder>
      • com.example.mdbook.PatientAdapter

  • public class PatientAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<PatientAdapter.PatientAdapterHolder>
    Creates an activity for the user to add patients Displays a list of all the patients already added
    See Also:
